meanings.definition: Charming or enchanting in a deceptive way.
meanings.sent1: The begalling music lured everyone to the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: The begalling smile on her face captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The begalling magician made the audience believe in magic.
meanings.sent4: Her begalling voice cast a spell on all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The begalling sunset painted the sky with mesmerizing colors.

meanings.definition: To charm or enchant someone in a deceptive way.
meanings.sent1: The con artist begalling his way into the wealthy widow's trust.
meanings.sent2: She begalling him with her sweet words and false promises.
meanings.sent3: The sly fox begalling the other animals with cunning tricks.
meanings.sent4: The enchantress begalling the prince with her magical spells.
meanings.sent5: The hypnotist begalling the audience with his mesmerizing performance.
